name: Old Skool Classics
description:
Arcade classic 3D includes seven of the games you remember and love in this all-in-one compilation. From challenging puzzles, energetic shooters, and amazing action games, there's something for everyone! Play in 3D for incredible immersive fun!

Features

• 7 of the most playable games of all time
• Puzzles, action, shooters: all on one cartridge!
• Endless addictive gameplay and massive replayability
• Full on 3D for an amazing experience
